Effects.name: bleeding_weak
Effects.card_description: Bleeding units lose hp equal to their weak attacks every time they attack. This effect lasts for 6 actions extending into the next round.
Effects.applied_description: Every time this unit attacks, deal weak damage to itself.

Effects.name: bleeding_strong
Effects.card_description: Bleeding units lose hp equal to their strong attacks every time they attack. This effect lasts for 6 actions extending into the next round.
Effects.applied_description: Every time this unit attacks, deal strong damage to itself.

Effects.name: bleeding
Effects.card_description: Bleeding units lose hp equal to their attacks every time they attack. This effect lasts for 6 actions extending into the next round.
Effects.applied_description: Every time this unit attacks, deal damage to itself.

Effects.name: poison_weak
Effects.card_description: Poisoned units lose hp equal to their weak attacks times the distance they move (up to 3 spaces). This effect lasts for 6 actions extending into the next round.
Effects.applied_description: Every time this unit moves, deal weak damage times the distance it moves to itself.

Effects.name: poison_strong
Effects.card_description: Poisoned units lose hp equal to their strong attacks times the distance they move (up to 3 spaces). This effect lasts for 6 actions extending into the next round.
Effects.applied_description: Every time this unit moves, deal weak damage times the distance it moves (up to 3 spaces) to itself.

Effects.name: blindness_weak
Effects.card_description: Blind units deal weak damage to ALL units in range of their attacks. This effect lasts for 6 actions extending into the next round.
Effects.applied_description: Every time this unit attacks, apply weak damage to enemy units and team units in range.

Effects.name: blindness_strong
Effects.card_description: Blind units deal strong damage to ALL units in range of their attacks. This effect lasts for 6 actions extending into the next round.
Effects.applied_description: Every time this unit attacks, apply strong damage to enemy units and team units in range.

Effects.name: blindness
Effects.card_description: Damage of attacks from blind units is dealt to ALL units in range. This effect lasts for 6 actions extending into the next round.
Effects.applied_description: Every time this unit attacks, apply strong damage to enemy units and team units in range.

Effects.name: paralysis_weak
Effects.card_description: Attack cards of weakly paralyzed units are disabled. This effect lasts for number of actions less than 5 given by attacker.
Effects.applied_description: Attack cards of this unit are disabled.

Effects.name: paralysis_strong
Effects.card_description: Attack cards of strongly paralyzed units are disabled. This effect lasts for number of actions greater than 4 given by attacker.
Effects.applied_description: Attack cards of this unit are disabled.

Effects.name: freeze_weak
Effects.card_description: Move cards of weakly frozen units are disabled. This effect lasts for number of actions less than 5 given by attacker.
Effects.applied_description: Move cards of this unit are disabled.

Effects.name: freeze_strong
Effects.card_description: Move cards of strongly frozen units are disabled. This effect lasts for number of actions greater than 4 given by attacker.
Effects.applied_description: Move cards of this unit are disabled.

Effects.name: add_specific_card
Effects.card_description: Place specified card on top of activated card's play space.

Effects.name: add_any_card
Effects.card_description: Place specified card on top of activated card's play space.

Effects.name: exposure
Effects.card_description: Exposed units instantly die if their hp drops below a certain threshold during this action.
Effects.applied_description: If this units hp drops below a certain threshold during this turn, this unit dies.
